getUserByEmp
The function returns data (full name) of the user by employee.
Syntax
getUserByEmp
(employee)
Setting
Purpose
employee
Attribute that contains the data (full name) of the employee.
Note
The function is called using the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Users and groups" tab.
Example
To define the data of the employee who made the last changes to the profile, write down the following algorithm fragment:
